reviews.author: Ibrahim Zeidan

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: To start I have to say how great this app is, my little one simply adores it, loves to dance along with the characters. The animations are cute and the singers are both adults and children, which I think is great. This purchase was worth every penny and I have had no technical problems. Thank you for such a quality app for children. I only wish you could fix a few things. First, the file is huge and I can\'t move it to my SD card on my tablet. Please fix that! Second, like others have said, it would be nice if the songs could be played randomly. It would also be great if you could create and save more than one playlist, for example an upbeat one and a lullaby one, a separate one for the phonics songs. It would just make the app a complete package. I truly hope the developers will address these issues. Otherwise this is truly great. For those who don\'t wish to purchase the songs, they do offer more free songs, often when you start the app, on some days. As for song purchases, I recommend the children\'s songs over the phonics songs.  Update! wrote to publishers and they actually wrote back...and as of the new update it can be moved to SD card. Excellent!  Thank you!
reviews.author: Szilvia Erdelyi-Botor
